activities:
Bridge2 Solutions (B2S) is a technology platform provider for the loyalty industry. B2S’s platform connects loyalty programs to merchants and commerce partners for loyalty program participants to redeem loyalty currency (i.e. points or miles) for goods and services. B2S provides all integration points, loyalty currency conversion, order management and reconciliation. As part of the service, B2S must store loyalty participant personal information in order to ensure the redeemed (i.e. purchased) goods and services are delivered to the proper location and the proper loyalty participant’s currency is deducted from the loyalty program. B2S only stores the minimally required information for the completion of order servicing and management for our clients, with such information also being passed to the appropriate fulfillment merchant. Therefore, B2S is required to store the following personal information for order management and history:
?	First Name
?	Last Name
?	Address
?	City
?	State/Province
?	Zip/Region/Postal Code 
?	Country
?	Phone
?	Email Address
